name: vcf_slice
title: Slice VCF File(s)
summary: Return a small section of a VCF file or files (similar to tabix).

inputSpec.name: vcf_fn
inputSpec.label: VCF files
inputSpec.help: Variant files to be sliced, in VCF format.

inputSpec.name: vcfidx_fn
inputSpec.label: VCF index files
inputSpec.help: Tabix index files corresponding to VCF files. Each VCF must have a corresponding index with matching base filename.

inputSpec.name: region_fn
inputSpec.label: File of regions (chr:start-stop)
inputSpec.help: Text file of genomic region coordinates. Variants within these ranges will be extracted from the given VCF files.

inputSpec.name: suffix
inputSpec.label: Output file name suffix (optional)
inputSpec.help: (Optional) Include this given string in the output VCF filename extension, e.g. '*.sliced.SUFFIX.vcf.gz'.

outputSpec.name: vcf_out
outputSpec.label: Sliced VCF files
outputSpec.help: Variant file containing only target regions, in VCF format.

outputSpec.name: vcfidx_out
outputSpec.label: Sliced VCF index files
outputSpec.help: Tabix index file corresponding to the output VCF files.
